cron.label: Cron (Scheduled Tasks) - all the times are in minutes
cron.comment: For correct URLs generated during cron runs please make sure that Web > Secure and Unsecure Base URLs are explicitly set.

maintenance.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.comment: Put store on the maintenance mode while backup's creation

enable_log.label: Enable Log
enable_log.comment: If set to "No" this option disables recently viewed products and compare products functionality for not logged in customers.

escaping.label: Escape CSV fields
escaping.comment: Disabling this setting can increase security risk.

configurable_page_size.label: Page size for import configurable products
configurable_page_size.comment: This option will be ignore if it set less than 1.

cookie_lifetime.label: Cookie Lifetime (seconds)
cookie_lifetime.comment: If empty, default value will be used.

ua_regexp.comment: Match expressions in the same order as displayed in the configuration.

template_ua_regexp.comment: Match expressions in the same order as displayed in the configuration.

pagination_frame.label: Pagination Frame
pagination_frame.comment: How many links to display at once.

pagination_frame_skip.label: Pagination Frame Skip
pagination_frame_skip.comment: If the current frame position does not cover utmost pages, will render link to current position plus/minus this value.

anchor_text_for_previous.label: Anchor Text for Previous
anchor_text_for_previous.comment: Alternative text for previous link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

anchor_text_for_next.label: Anchor Text for Next
anchor_text_for_next.comment: Alternative text for next link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png. To make logo look good on high-resolution displays, upload an image that is 2x normal size and then specify 1x dimensions in width/height fields below.

logo_width.label: Logo Width
logo_width.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

logo_height.label: Logo Height
logo_height.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

css_non_inline.label: Non-inline CSS File(s)
css_non_inline.comment: Comma-delimited list of files that will be included inside <style> tag for all templates that include use the '{{var non_inline_styles}}' variable. File path is relative to skin/frontend/PACKAGE/THEME/css/

shortcut_icon.label: Favicon Icon
shortcut_icon.comment: Allowed file types: ICO, PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG, APNG. Not all browsers support all these formats!

includes.label: Miscellaneous Scripts
includes.comment: This will be included before head closing tag in page HTML.

absolute_footer.label: Miscellaneous HTML
absolute_footer.comment: This will be displayed just before body closing tag.

image.label: Watermark
image.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

allow_ips.label: Allowed IPs (comma separated)
allow_ips.comment: Leave empty for access from any location.

allow_symlink.label: Allow Symlinks
allow_symlink.comment: Warning! Enabling this feature is not recommended on production environments because it represents a potential security risk.

active_admin.label: Enabled for Admin
active_admin.comment: Translate, blocks and other output caches should be disabled for both frontend and admin inline translations.

file.label: System Log File Name
file.comment: Logging from Mage::log(). File is located in {{base_dir}}/var/log

exception_file.label: Exceptions Log File Name
exception_file.comment: Logging from Mage::logException(). File is located in {{base_dir}}/var/log

optional_zip_countries.label: Postal Code is Optional for the following countries

phone.label: Store Contact Telephone
phone.comment: If present, this will be included in all Transactional Emails

hours.label: Store Hours of Operation
hours.comment: If present, this will be included in all Transactional Emails

synchronize.comment: After selecting a new media storage location, press the Synchronize button to transfer all media to that location. Media will not be available in the new location until the synchronization process is complete.

password_reset_link_expiration_period.label: Recovery Link Expiration Period (hours)
password_reset_link_expiration_period.comment: Please enter a number 1 or greater in this field.

custom.label: Custom Admin URL
custom.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/magento/

custom_path.label: Custom Admin Path
custom_path.comment: You will have to log in after you save your custom admin path.

session_cookie_lifetime.label: Session Lifetime (seconds)
session_cookie_lifetime.comment: Values less than 60 are ignored. Note that changes will apply after logout.

domain_policy_backend.label: Allow Magento Backend to run in frame
domain_policy_backend.comment: Enabling ability to run Magento in a frame is not recommended for security reasons.

domain_policy_frontend.label: Allow Magento Frontend to run in frame
domain_policy_frontend.comment: Enabling ability to run Magento in a frame is not recommended for security reasons.

extensions_compatibility_mode.label: Admin routing compatibility mode for extensions
extensions_compatibility_mode.comment: Enabling this setting increases risk of automated attacks against admin functionality.

forgot_password_ip_times.label: Forgot password requests to times per hour from 1 IP

forgot_password_email_times.label: Forgot password requests to times per 24 hours from 1 e-mail

failed_attempts_login.label: Number of Unsuccessful Attempts to Login
failed_attempts_login.comment: If 0 is specified, CAPTCHA on the Login form will be always available.

length.label: Number of Symbols
length.comment: Please specify 8 symbols at the most. Range allowed (e.g. 3-5)

symbols.label: Symbols Used in CAPTCHA
symbols.comment:
Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z) or numbers (0-9) in this field. No spaces or other characters are allowed.
Similar looking characters (e.g. "i", "l", "1") decrease chance of correct recognition by customer.

use_store.label: Add Store Code to Urls
use_store.comment: Warning! When using Store Code in URLs, in some cases system may not work properly if URLs without Store Codes are specified in the third party services (e.g. PayPal etc.).

redirect_to_base.label: Auto-redirect to Base URL
redirect_to_base.comment: I.e. redirect from http://example.com/store/ to http://www.example.com/store/

base_js_url.label: Base JavaScript URL
base_js_url.comment: Warning! When using CDN, in some cases JavaScript may not run properly if CDN is not in your subdomain

base_url.label: Base URL
base_url.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/magento/

base_link_url.label: Base Link URL
base_link_url.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/magento/

base_js_url.label: Base JavaScript URL
base_js_url.comment: Warning! When using CDN, in some cases JavaScript may not run properly if CDN is not in your subdomain

poll_check_by_ip.label: Disallow Voting in a Poll Multiple Times from Same IP-address

use_frontend_sid.label: Use SID on Frontend
use_frontend_sid.comment: Allows customers to stay logged in when switching between different stores.

cookies.label: Redirect to CMS-page if Cookies are Disabled

javascript.label: Show Notice if JavaScript is Disabled

base.label: Base Currency
base.comment: Base currency is used for all online payment transactions. Scope is defined by the catalog price scope ("Catalog" > "Price" > "Catalog Price Scope").

auto_group_assign.label: Enable Automatic Assignment to Customer Group
auto_group_assign.comment: To show VAT number on frontend, set Show VAT Number on Frontend option to Yes.

viv_domestic_group.label: Group for Valid VAT ID - Domestic

viv_intra_union_group.label: Group for Valid VAT ID - Intra-Union

viv_disable_auto_group_assign_default.label: Default Value for Disable Automatic Group Changes Based on VAT ID

email_confirmed_template.label: Welcome Email
email_confirmed_template.comment: This email will be sent instead of default welcome email, after account confirmation.

password_or_email_template.label: Changed Email or Password Email Template

reset_link_expiration_period.label: Recovery Link Expiration Period (hours)
reset_link_expiration_period.comment: Please enter a number 1 or greater in this field.

require_admin_user_to_change_user_passwo.label: Require admin user to change user password

street_lines.label: Number of Lines in a Street Address
street_lines.comment: Leave empty for default (2). Valid range: 1-4

prefix_show.label: Show Prefix
prefix_show.comment: The title that goes before name (Mr., Mrs., etc.)

prefix_options.label: Prefix Dropdown Options
prefix_options.comment:
Semicolon (;) separated values.
Put semicolon in the beginning for empty first option.
Leave empty for open text field.

suffix_show.label: Show Suffix
suffix_show.comment: The suffix that goes after name (Jr., Sr., etc.)

suffix_options.label: Suffix Dropdown Options
suffix_options.comment:
Semicolon (;) separated values.
Put semicolon in the beginning for empty first option.
Leave empty for open text field.

redirect_dashboard.label: Redirect Customer to Account Dashboard after Logging in
redirect_dashboard.comment: Customer will stay on the current page if "No" is selected.

forms.label: Forms
forms.comment: CAPTCHA for "Create user" and "Forgot password" forms is always enabled if chosen

failed_attempts_login.label: Number of Unsuccessful Attempts to Login
failed_attempts_login.comment: If 0 is specified, CAPTCHA on the Login form will be always available.

length.label: Number of Symbols
length.comment: Please specify 8 symbols at the most. Range allowed (e.g. 3-5)

symbols.label: Symbols Used in CAPTCHA
symbols.comment:
Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z) or numbers (0-9) in this field. No spaces or other characters are allowed.
Similar looking characters (e.g. "i", "l", "1") decrease chance of correct recognition by customer.

use_static_urls_in_catalog.label: Use Static URLs for Media Content in WYSIWYG for Catalog
use_static_urls_in_catalog.comment: Applicable to catalog products and categories only. Any media content will be inserted into editor as a static URL. It is not updated if the system configuration base URL changes.

grid_per_page_values.label: Products per Page on Grid Allowed Values

grid_per_page.label: Products per Page on Grid Default Value
grid_per_page.comment: Must be in the allowed values list.

list_per_page_values.label: Products per Page on List Allowed Values

list_per_page.label: Products per Page on List Default Value
list_per_page.comment: Must be in the allowed values list.

flat_catalog_product.label: Use Flat Catalog Product
flat_catalog_product.comment: Enable for reindexing a big number of SKUs.

list_allow_all.label: Allow All Products per Page
list_allow_all.comment: Whether to show "All" option in the "Show X Per Page" dropdown.

parse_url_directives.label: Allow Dynamic Media URLs in Products and Categories
parse_url_directives.comment: E.g. {{media url="path/to/image.jpg"}} {{skin url="path/to/picture.gif"}}. Dynamic directives parsing impacts catalog performance.

base_width.label: Base Image Width
base_width.comment: Maximum width base product image will be scaled down to in pixels

small_width.label: Small Image Width
small_width.comment: Maximum width small product image will be scaled down to in pixels

max_dimension.label: Maximum resolution for upload image
max_dimension.comment: Maximum width and height resolutions for upload image

product_use_categories.label: Use Categories Path for Product URLs

save_rewrites_history.label: Create Permanent Redirect for URLs if URL Key Changed

category_canonical_tag.label: Use Canonical Link Meta Tag For Categories

product_canonical_tag.label: Use Canonical Link Meta Tag For Products

scope.label: Catalog Price Scope
scope.comment: Defines the base currency scope ("Currency Setup" > "Currency Options" > "Base Currency").

price_range_max_intervals.label: Maximum Number of Price Intervals
price_range_max_intervals.comment: Maximum number of price intervals is 100

one_price_interval.label: Display Price Interval as One Price
one_price_interval.comment: This setting will be applied when all prices in the specific price interval are equal.

interval_division_limit.label: Interval Division Limit
interval_division_limit.comment: Please specify the number of products, that will not be divided into subintervals.

use_layered_navigation_count.label: Apply Layered Navigation if Search Results are Less Than
use_layered_navigation_count.comment: Enter "0" to enable layered navigation for any number of results.

allow_price.label: Allow Alert When Product Price Changes

allow_stock.label: Allow Alert When Product Comes Back in Stock

order_item_status.label: Order Item Status to Enable Downloads

disable_guest_checkout.label: Disable Guest Checkout if Cart Contains Downloadable Items
disable_guest_checkout.comment: Guest checkout will only work with shareable.

apply_for_all.label: Apply MAP (Default Value)
apply_for_all.comment: Warning! Applying MAP by default will hide all product prices on the frontend.

hide_customer_ip.label: Hide Customer IP
hide_customer_ip.comment: Controls whether customer IP is shown in orders, invoices, shipments, credit memos.

logo.label: Logo for PDF Print-outs (200x50)
logo.comment:
Default logo, will be used in PDF and HTML documents.
(jpeg, tiff, png) If you see image distortion in PDF, try to use larger image

logo_html.label: Logo for HTML Print View
logo_html.comment:
Logo for HTML documents only. If empty, default will be used.
(jpeg, gif, png)

description.label: Description Message
description.comment: This message will be shown in shopping cart when subtotal after discount less than minimum amount.

error_message.label: Error to Show in Shopping Cart

multi_address.label: Validate Each Address Separately in Multi-address Checkout

multi_address_description.label: Multi-address Description Message
multi_address_description.comment: If empty, the default description above will be used.

multi_address_error_message.label: Multi-address Error to Show in Shopping Cart
multi_address_error_message.comment: If empty, the default error above will be used.

use_aggregated_data.label: Use Aggregated Data (beta)
use_aggregated_data.comment: Improves dashboard performance but provides non-realtime data.

allow_order.label: Allow Gift Messages on Order Level

allow_items.label: Allow Gift Messages for Order Items

centinel_is_mode_strict.label: Severe 3D Secure Card Validation
centinel_is_mode_strict.comment: Severe validation removes chargeback liability on merchant.

centinel_api_url.label: Centinel API URL
centinel_api_url.comment: A value is required for live mode. Refer to your CardinalCommerce agreement.

authorizenet.label: Authorize.net
authorizenet.comment: Click here to sign up for an Authorize.net account

centinel_is_mode_strict.label: Severe 3D Secure Card Validation
centinel_is_mode_strict.comment: Severe Validation Removes Chargeback Liability on Merchant

centinel_api_url.label: Centinel API URL
centinel_api_url.comment: If empty, a default value will be used. Custom URL may be provided by CardinalCommerce agreement.

merchant_country.label: Merchant Country
merchant_country.comment: If not specified, Default Country from General Config will be used

paypal_group_all_in_one.label: PayPal All-in-One Payment Solutions  Accept and process credit cards and PayPal payments.
paypal_group_all_in_one.comment: Choose a secure bundled payment solution for your business.

paypal_payment_gateways.label: PayPal Payment Gateways
paypal_payment_gateways.comment: Process payments using your own internet merchant account.

paypal_alternative_payment_methods.label: PayPal Express Checkout
paypal_alternative_payment_methods.comment: Add another payment method to your existing solution or as a stand-alone option.

paypal_payment_solutions.label: PayPal Payment Solutions
paypal_payment_solutions.comment: Add another payment method to your existing solution or as a stand-alone option.

payflow_advanced.label: Payments Advanced (Includes Express Checkout)
payflow_advanced.comment: Accept payments with a PCI-compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site.

user.label: User
user.comment: PayPal recommends that you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com
user.tooltip: PayPal recommends you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com, instead of entering your admin username and password here. This will enhance your security and prevent service interruptions if you later change your password. If you do not want to set up an additional User, you can re-enter your Merchant Login here.

business_account.label: Email Associated with PayPal Merchant Account
business_account.tooltip: Don't have a PayPal account? Simply enter your email address.

enable_payflow_advanced.label: Enable this Solution
enable_payflow_advanced.comment: Both section above must be complete.

enable_express_checkout_bml.comment: PayPal Payments Advanced lets you give customers access to financing through Paypal Credit® - at no additional cost to you. You get paid up front, even though customers have more time to pay. A pre-integrated payment button lets customers pay quickly with Paypal Credit®. Learn More

advanced_advertise_bml.label: Advertise Paypal Credit
advanced_advertise_bml.comment:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from Paypal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise Paypal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "Debit or Credit Card" per store views.

url_method.label: URL method for Cancel URL and Return URL

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.

settlement_reports_ftp_ip.label: Custom Endpoint Hostname or IP-Address
settlement_reports_ftp_ip.tooltip: Use colon to specify port. For example: "test.example.com:5224".

logo.label: PayPal Product Logo
logo.comment: Displays on catalog pages and homepage.

page_style.label: Page Style
page_style.tooltip: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).

paypal_hdrimg.label: Header Image URL
paypal_hdrimg.tooltip: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

paypal_hdrbackcolor.label: Header Background Color
paypal_hdrbackcolor.tooltip: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

paypal_payflowcolor.label: Page Background Color
paypal_payflowcolor.tooltip: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

authorization_honor_period.label: Authorization Honor Period (days)
authorization_honor_period.comment: Specifies what the Authorization Honor Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

order_valid_period.label: Order Valid Period (days)
order_valid_period.comment: Specifies what the Order Valid Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

child_authorization_number.label: Number of Child Authorizations
child_authorization_number.comment: The default number of child authorizations in your PayPal account is 1. To do multiple authorizations please contact PayPal to request an increase.

transfer_shipping_options.label: Transfer Shipping Options
transfer_shipping_options.tooltip: If this option is enabled, customer can change shipping address and shipping method on PayPal website. In live mode works via HTTPS protocol only.
transfer_shipping_options.comment: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.

solution_type.label: Enable PayPal Guest Checkout
solution_type.comment: Ability for buyer to purchase without PayPal account.

require_billing_address.label: Require Customer's Billing Address
require_billing_address.comment: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

allow_ba_signup.label: Billing Agreement Signup
allow_ba_signup.comment: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
allow_ba_signup.tooltip: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.

wpp.label: Website Payments Pro (Includes Express Checkout)
wpp.comment: Accept payments with a completely customizable checkout.

GB.comment: Accept payments with a completely customizable checkout page.

enable_express_checkout_bml.comment: Website Payments Pro lets you give customers access to financing through Paypal Credit® - at no additional cost to you. You get paid up front, even though customers have more time to pay. A pre-integrated payment button lets customers pay quickly with Paypal Credit®. Learn More

wpp_advertise_bml.label: Advertise Paypal Credit
wpp_advertise_bml.comment:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from Paypal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise Paypal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

wpp_and_express_checkout.label: Website Payments Pro and Express Checkout

wpp_settings.label: Basic Settings - PayPal Website Payments Pro

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "Debit or Credit Card" per store views.

cctypes.label: Allowed Credit Card Types
cctypes.comment: 3D Secure validation is required for Maestro cards. Supporting of American Express cards require additional agreement. Learn more at http://www.paypal.com/amexupdate.

centinel_is_mode_strict.label: Severe 3D Secure Card Validation
centinel_is_mode_strict.comment: Severe Validation Removes Chargeback Liability on Merchant

centinel_api_url.label: Centinel Custom API URL
centinel_api_url.comment: If empty, a default value will be used. Custom URL may be provided by CardinalCommerce agreement.

wps.label: Website Payments Standard
wps.comment: Accept credit card and PayPal payments securely.

GB.comment: Accept credit cards, debit cards and PayPal payments securely.

settings_payments_standart.label: Basic Settings - PayPal Website Payments Standard

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

line_items_summary.label: Summary Text for Aggregated Cart
line_items_summary.comment: Uses store frontend name by default.

wps_express.label: Website Payments Standard (Includes Express Checkout)
wps_express.comment: Add PayPal as an additional payment method to your checkout page.

wps_express_advertise_bml.label: Advertise Paypal Credit
wps_express_advertise_bml.comment:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from Paypal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise Paypal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

GB.comment: Add PayPal as an additional payment method to your checkout page to increase your sales.

settings_wps_express.label: Basic Settings - PayPal Website Payments Standard

paypal_verisign.label: Payflow Pro
paypal_verisign.comment: Connect your merchant account with a fully customizable gateway that lets customers pay without leaving your site.

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "Debit or Credit Card" per store views.

cctypes.label: Allowed Credit Card Types
cctypes.comment: Supporting of American Express cards require additional agreement. Learn more at http://www.paypal.com/amexupdate.

centinel_api_url.label: Centinel API URL
centinel_api_url.comment: A value is required for live mode. Refer to your CardinalCommerce agreement.

user.comment: If you do not have multiple users set up on your account, please re-enter your Vendor/Merchant Login here.

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "Debit or Credit Card" per store views.

payments_pro_payflow_edition.comment: Accept payments in your shopping cart. PayPal will process your card payments through the Payflow Gateway.

payments_pro_hosted_solution.comment: Accept payments with a PCI compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site.

pphs_settings.label: Basic Settings - PayPal Website Payments Plus
Basic Settings - PayPal Payments Pro Hosted Solution

title.label: Title
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

display_ec.label: Display Express Checkout in the Payment Information step

payments_pro_hosted_solution_with_expres.label: Website Payments Pro Hosted Solution (Includes Express Checkout)

pphs_required_settings_pphs.label: Website Payments Pro Hosted Solution and Express Checkout

can_back_in_stock.label: Set Items' Status to be In Stock When Order is Cancelled

show_out_of_stock.label: Display Out of Stock Products
show_out_of_stock.comment: Products will still be shown by direct product URLs.

display_product_stock_status.label: Display products availability in stock in the frontend

item_options.comment: Note that these settings are applicable to cart line items, not the whole cart.
item_options.label: Product Stock Options

max_sale_qty.label: Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart

min_qty.label: Qty for Item's Status to Become Out of Stock

min_sale_qty.label: Minimum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart

checkout_multiple_maximum_qty.label: Maximum Qty Allowed for Shipping to Multiple Addresses

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

additional_protection_value.label: Additional Protection Configuration Value
additional_protection_value.comment: Used only when "Additional Protection Value" is set to "Configuration". Can contain only numeric amount.

account.label: Account ID
account.comment: Please make sure to use only digits here. No dashes are allowed.

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

smartpost_hubid.label: Hub ID
smartpost_hubid.comment: The field is applicable if the Smart Post method is selected.

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

min_package_weight.label: Minimum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for minimum supported shipping weight)

mode_xml.label: Mode
mode_xml.comment: Enables/Disables SSL verification of Magento server by UPS.

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

handling_action.label: Handling Applied
handling_action.comment: "Per Order" allows single handling fee for entire order. "Per Package" allows individual handling fee for each package.

divide_order_weight.label: Divide Order Weight
divide_order_weight.comment: Allows breaking total order weight into smaller pieces if it exeeds 70 kg to ensure accurate calculation of shipping charges.

ready_time.label: Ready time
ready_time.comment: Package ready time after order submission (in hours)

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

customer_must_be_logged.label: Require Customer To Be Logged In To Checkout

redirect_to_cart.label: After Adding a Product Redirect to Shopping Cart

copy_to.label: Send Payment Failed Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Failed Email Copy Method

price_includes_tax.label: Catalog Prices
price_includes_tax.comment: Whether catalog prices entered by admin include tax.

shipping_includes_tax.label: Shipping Prices
shipping_includes_tax.comment: Whether shipping amounts entered by admin or obtained from gateways include tax.

discount_tax.label: Apply Discount On Prices
discount_tax.comment: Apply discount on price including tax is calculated based on store tax, if "Apply Tax after Discount" is selected.

cross_border_trade_enabled.label: Enable Cross Border Trade
cross_border_trade_enabled.comment: When catalog price includes tax, enable this setting will fix the price no matter what the customer's tax rate is.

sales_display.label: Orders, Invoices, Credit Memos Display Settings

display.label: Display Prices On Product View Page

cleanup_probability.label: Cleanup Probability
cleanup_probability.comment: Integer. Launch cleanup in X OAuth requests. 0 (not recommended) - to disable cleanup

expiration_period.label: Expiration Period
expiration_period.comment: Cleanup entries older than X minutes.

test_mode.label: Test Mode
test_mode.comment: Overrides API URL that may be specified by a payment method.

swatch_attributes.label: Product Attributes to Show as Swatches in Product Detail

product_list_attribute.label: Product Attribute to Use for Swatches in Product Listing

product_list_price_change.label: Dynamic Price Change for Swatches in Product Listing

product_detail_dimensions.label: Swatch Dimensions on Product Detail Page
product_detail_dimensions.comment: Innermost dimensions, not including border, in pixels

product_listing_dimensions.label: Swatch Dimensions in Product Listing
product_listing_dimensions.comment: Innermost dimensions, not including border, in pixels

layered_nav_dimensions.label: Swatch Dimensions in Layered Navigation
layered_nav_dimensions.comment: Innermost dimensions, not including border, in pixels

moneybookers_email.label: Email Address of Your Moneybookers Account
moneybookers_email.comment: To have access to the international payment network of Moneybookers please register here for a free account if you don’t have one yet.

secret_key.label: Secret Word
secret_key.comment: Pre-shared secret key to secure the transaction. After activation Moneybookers will give you access to a new section in your Moneybookers account called "Merchant tools". Please choose a secret word (do not use your password for this) and provide it in your Moneybookers admin area and above.

moneybookers_acc.label: All Credit Cards / Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, JCB, Diners (powered by Moneybookers) - International

moneybookers_mae.label: Maestro (powered by Moneybookers) - United Kingdom, Austria, Spain
